column5: For those of you who head to LOTW's for muskies, are there lodges that excel over the others on the lake? Whether it's because of location on the lake, etc, what lodges are considered the best? Please feel, to send me a private message. Thanks in advance for your insight.
There are certainly lodges who do more musky fishing than others. In the Morson area... Todd at Tamarack has a large focus on muskies. He's in a great spot for big fish.

Red Wing Lodge. http://www.redwinglodge.net. I will personally guarantee more are caught there than anywhere else on LOTW. Look at their charts on the website. I know a 56 inch fish was caught there a few weeks ago.Frank
Frank and Laura at Bay Store Camp
Flag Island Resort. I'll always go back because of the clean rooms and outstanding service and food.
Witch Bay Camp. Every time I have been there a third of the guests and more in the fall are Muskie fishing. Plenty of videos on Youtube.
